comments.author: albus.4273
comments.body: I have my script set to 12 second intervals, with it running in the background during a boss fight, it add some lag. I think 30-60 seconds is plenty, 40-45 second might be a good sweet spot (this is probably what I’ll set my script to).

comments.author: Drakma.1549
comments.body: There is currently no limit on calls. Although it is always best to cache your data to reduce stress on their API servers.

comments.author: maomao.6201
comments.body:
I wasn’t able to find any info about this. What is the rate limit on calling the API?

Maybe there needs to be an FAQ sticky for general information like this?
